pr_title: [DOCS] Drafts API changes for transform latest function

timeline.message: [DOCS] Drafts API changes for transform latest function

timeline.bodyText: unique_key always needs to be an array, hence: "unique_key": ["customer_id"]
timeline.author: przemekwitek
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -261,3 +287,31 @@ When the {transform} is created, you receive the following results:
   "acknowledged" : true
 }

+
+The following {transform} uses the `latest` method:

+{
+  "source": {
+    "index": "kibana_sample_data_ecommerce"
+  },
+  "latest": {
+    "unique_key": "customer_id",
